name: Get a share of 2 BILLION $WUD rewards with WUD Airlyft Campaign - Into the WUD ü™µ
description:
WUD Airlyft Campaign - Into the WUDs ü™µ

Step Into the WUDs ‚Äî a campaign designed to onboard new users into the Polkadot ecosystem while rewarding those who engage with WUD and its partners.

Complete quests to earn XP by:

ü™ô Buying WUD with your connected wallet
ü™ô Holding WUD on Hydration
ü™ô Joining community chats
ü™ô Following socials
ü™ô Participating in fun quizzes

The more XP you earn, the higher your chance of winning! 100 winners will share the 2 BILLION $WUD prize pool at the end of the campaign.

More quests will be added along the way, so be sure to follow our Airlyft page and check daily to stay ahead!

name: Earn WAVE points and share 40,000 BNC pool prize with Bifrost BNC Explorers Campaign
description:
Following vBNC‚Äôs successful migration from Bifrost-Kusama to Bifrost-Polkadot, we proudly unveil BNC Explorers‚Äîthe second phase of the Liquid Wave campaign.

This stage empowers users to mint vBNC, engage with the ecosystem, and prepare for Bifrost Tokenomics 2.0 and step into the new era of Fee Switch.

Earn WAVE points through the following tasks to claim BNC rewards, convertible to bbBNC post-event:
1. Mint vBNC
- Earn 5 WAVE per 1 vBNC minted.
- 10% bonus WAVE for minting during Week 1.
- Redeeming vBNC during the event deducts corresponding WAVE points.

2. Invite & Earn
- Inviters receive 10% of their invitees‚Äô minted WAVE points.
- Example: If Alice invites Bob, and Bob earns 150 WAVE, Alice gains 15 WAVE.

3. Convert Raindrops: Exchange legacy Raindrops points for WAVE at 100:1 during the event.

4. Governance Participation: Voting on designated OpenGov proposals with vBNC unlocks an additional 10% minting bonus.

The sooner and more WAVE points you earn, the bigger your farmed BNC rewards will be!

name: 100M ASTR up for grabs with ACS Campaign
description:
The Astar Contribution Score (ACS) campaign is launching on Soneium to drive user adoption, incentivize on-chain activity, and expand the utility of ASTR. Starting on February 20 and running until May 30, ACS will reward users for engaging with the ecosystem‚Äîwhether through gaming, consumer apps, or liquidity provision.

ACS utilizes a score-based model to measure and reward contributions across the Soneium ecosystem. Here‚Äôs how it works:

- Users earn ACS points based on their interactions within Soneium, from gaming and consumer applications to liquidity provision.
- Liquidity providers receive multipliers on their contributions, with ASTR-based liquidity enjoying the highest multiplier to reinforce its role as the ecosystem‚Äôs primary asset.
- Gaming and consumer application users accumulate points based on their engagement, driving real utility across web3 experiences.
- Projects integrating ASTR play a key role in the campaign, distributing ACS rewards to their users and strengthening the token‚Äôs adoption.

Once the campaign concludes, ACS points will be redeemable for ASTR tokens at a fixed rate of 1 ACS = 0.1 ASTR, directly rewarding users based on their engagement and contributions throughout the event.

name: Earn Points with Soneium Conquest on Galxe
description:
Embark on a new web3 adventure with Soneium Conquest.

Dive into a 4-week journey through the heart of the Soneium ecosystem.

Creators, developers, and web3 explorers: this is your moment to connect, learn, and shape the future of Soneium.

name: Share up to $75,000 in RARI rewards with DeFi Days campaign
description:
DeFi Days by RARI is an 8 week-long campaign, aimed at introducing earning opportunities for creators and collectors through DeFi partnerships on RARI Chain.

Rewards: ~$75,000 in RARI & partner tokens

Rules:
- Complete Tasks and Collect NFTs: Engage in various activities to earn NFTs PLUS returns from DeFi.
- Climb the Leaderboard: Move up the leaderboard based on the number of DeFi Days NFT rewards you've collected and your total transactions.
- Earn Additional Prizes: Top performers will receive extra rewards based on their leaderboard status.

name: Earn WAVE points and share 150,000 BNC pool prize with Bifrost Liquid Wave Campaign
description:
Bifrost Liquid Wave - LST Campers is NOW LIVE!

Jump into liquid staking tasks on Liquid Wave to earn WAVE points and unlock your share of a massive 150,000 BNC Prize Pool!

Ways to earn include:
‚Ä¢ Liquid stake your $DOT, $MANTA, $GLMR or $ASTR
‚Ä¢ Exchange old Raindrop points at 100:1
‚Ä¢ Invite friends: earn 10% of their WAVE points by minting LSTs
‚Ä¢ WAVE Airdrop: earn 300 extra after reaching 1000 WAVE points

The sooner and more WAVE points you earn, the bigger your farmed BNC rewards will be!

name: Jump into peaq's Get Real preseason campaign on Galxe and earn XP rewards
description:
üìÜ Get Real preseason is LIVE!

üöÄ Web3 is getting real ‚Äî on peaq
Something huge is happening in crypto, and it's all about rewarding real people creating real value in the real world. Get ready for peaq's groundbreaking Get Real campaign, where you'll discover how Web3 and DePINs are reshaping the world. Complete quests, get to know revolutionary projects, and be part of something unprecedented in crypto.

üèÜ Preseason perks
We promised otherworldly rewards ‚Äî and we meant it! Start earning XP now and get a massive 50% XP boost when Season 1 kicks off in December. Early peaqonauts don't just get ahead ‚Äî they get a supercharge.

üåü Join the Revolution
The future of Web3 isn't just on-chain ‚Äî it's in the real world, and it starts right here, right now. Don't miss your chance to be part of this infrastructure revolution. Jump into the Get Real preseason on Galxe today and get ready for the out-of-this-world rewards.

name: Share 10M AJUN pool prize with BBB campaign - use the code 2758
description:
USE CODE: 2758

10M AJUN are up for grabs for those who create Legendary Ballz, an additional 50 prizes of 1,000 AJUN are being sent out amongst those who complete the AirLyft Onboarding Campaign!

BBB is Ajuna Network's second collective-based game, similar to AAA gameplay, but with some twists. BBB is our first game to test a free-2-play model, affiliate system, and incentivized tournaments. Furthermore, it‚Äôs an explorative game to enter the mobile market and prepare for the adoption of more complex titles. 

Most importantly, it's being used to transition from Bajun Network to Ajuna Network and reward those who participate in the game over the next couple months, with our mainnet token.

name: Win $3,000 prize pool with Credit Farm campaign on Playnation
description:
Rise to the challenge and become a Penguin farmer who makes a real-world impact! 

Airdrops are distributed via raffles. 

How to earn raffles:
1. Top 250 on Credit Farm leaderboard:
Leaderboard rankings are based on your Earn Speed (blue coin-per-second) in the game. Top 250 players are eligible for raffles. 1st rank has up to 5 raffles allocated!

2. Weekly top inviters:
Each week during the four weeks of the campaign, top 10 inviters on the Weekly Top Inviters leaderboard are rewarded with raffles. 

3. Weekly top new farmers:
Newbie farmers can compete in the new Weekly New Farmer Leaderboard. Each week, from Monday 0:00 UTC to Sunday 23:59 UTC, a new farmer is defined as playing Credit Farm for the first time within that week.

4. Social event winners:
Winners in social events during the campaign time can earn additional raffles.

name: Grab your share of $9,500 pool prize in VARA with Vara Kick-to-Airdrop campaign
description:
Participants can receive airdrops through a raffle system. Raffle entries can be purchased using NPS at an exchange rate of 10,000 NPS for 1 raffle entry.

After a snapshot, the system will calculate and allocate the number of raffle entries purchased with NPS for each participant.

The detailed mechanism is as follows:

1. Based on Vara Football Leaderboard: The top 400 players on the leaderboard will have the right to purchase raffle entries with NPS. Higher rankings will allow for more raffle entries.
2. Based on Vara Onchain Check-In Leaderboard: The top 50 participants will have the right to purchase raffle entries with NPS.
3. Based on Invite Leaderboard: The top 50 participants will have the right to purchase raffle entries with NPS. The more friends invited, the more raffle entries can be purchased.
4. Social Event Activities: Participate in social activities to earn additional raffle entries with NPS.

Note: Each raffle entry guarantees a 100% chance of winning VARA tokens with a minimum value of $5. The number of raffle entries a player can obtain is unlimited.

name: Join Tanssi's Let's Forkin' Dance incentivized testnet campaign to share the pool of 4M tokens
description:
Let's Forkin' Dance Is Here!

'Let's Forkin' Dance' - Tanssi's incentivized testnet campaign is a mix of on-chain and off-chain quests designed for the Tanssi community. Whether you're a developer, a casual user, or a key network supporter, there's something for you.

1% of the Tanssi Network is reserved for this campaign - which is the first campaign ever hosted by the Tanssi Foundation. 40% of the incentives pool, which amounts to 4M tokens, will be allocated to the Tanssians track with only the top 4000 participants receiving it. Stay tuned that more is coming up!

The campaign launches on April 30, 2024. To stay ahead, set an alert or join the Tanssi communities, ensuring you're one of the first to access the LFD campaign portal.

LFD plays a critical role in the upcoming launch of the Tanssi Network. Engaged participants not only earn incentives but also get to significantly contribute to the network's live environment.

- Winners will be drawn after a few days of the campaign. 
- Remember to come back when we announce the winners to claim your reward!

name: Share $4,750 pool prize in DED with $DED Egg Hunt Airdrop campaign
description:
‚úàÔ∏è The '$DED Egg Hunt Airdrop' campaign is now live! ‚úàÔ∏è

Don't let our beloved users wait anymore! We're pleased to announce - The DED Airdrop event has officially started with a prize pool of $4,750 (distributed in $DED token).

Duration: June 26 - July 10

Why you shouldn't miss it?
üî• Guaranteed 100% TOKEN Wins.
üî• Each raffle now ranges from $2.5 to $10. 
üî• A completely new mechanism: Raffle Purchase  

Who's eligible to get Airdrop?
1. Top DED Huntdrop Leaderboard
- Time: 26 June - 10 July
- Top 265 NPS holders can purchase raffles with $NPS. Higher ranks get more raffles.

2. Early Adopter Leaderboard
- Time: 15 Apr - 14 June
- Top 150 (Apr 15 - May 15) and Top 100 (June 1 - 14) NPS holders can purchase up to 3 raffles. 

3. Social Event Winners
- Time: 26 June - 10 July
- Participate in events on Playnation's channels to earn raffles.

4. Top Inviters
- Time: 15 Apr - 10 July
- Top inviters will receive raffle gifts from Playnation.

‚ÄºÔ∏è NOTE: 
- For Top Leaderboards who are eligible for Raffle Purchase, you can buy with 30,000 NPS/ raffle, which will be open for sale from July 12 - July 19.
- You can win multiple types of raffle, depending on your efforts.

name: Win $2000 in USDT Prize Pool with Creditcoin's Real-World EVM Gamified Testnet campaign
description:
The moment you‚Äôve been waiting for! It‚Äôs time to showcase your Testnet credentials for a chance to win from the bonus $2,000 in USDT prize pool!

- Using the faucets on Discord to receive Testnet tokens.
- Completing a range of on-chain activities (e.g. validating, staking, transferring, etc.)
- Executing smart contracts (developers)

name: Join Airlyft is $PINK campaign to share a 430,000 PINK prize pool
description:
Get ready for an out-of-this-world opportunity to win big in the PINK campaign. In this collaboration between Moonbeam and Airlyft, we're launching a massive $PINK token pool that could shower you with up to 500,000 PINK tokens!

To increase your chances of winning, you'll need to perform on-chain transactions every single day. Consistency is key to unlocking the ultimate PINK treasure trove. Mark your calendars and get ready for a daily ritual of transactions that will make your odds of winning soar higher! üåå

Rewards
1. 10 winners with the best Meme on Twitter will be eligible for a 70,000 PINK pool
2. 200 winners from random raffle will be eligible for a 430,000 PINK pool

Don't miss this stellar opportunity to join the $PINK token craze üéÄ. The countdown has begun. Strap in, crypto explorers, and let the PINK Token commence! üöÄ

description:
Astar's zkEVM mainnet is LIVE!  Be among the first to explore.

Level up your Web3 game with Airlyft's zkEVM event!  Complete the challenges and score awesome prizes:
- Every winner gets a limited-edition Astar NFT
- 50 lucky explorers will share a 2500 ASTR prize pool!

Think you've got what it takes to build the future of Web3?  Prove it, and the rewards are yours!

name: Omni LS - Moonbeam campaign
description: The Moonbeam x Omni LS dApp Campaign is the first in a series of events that will also involve Polkadot ecosystem Wallets, as well as Polkadot itself.

name: Road To The Unlock!
description: By following the whole campaign and testing the new Omni LS & partners dapps, you will be able to collect several NFTs along the road. By collecting all NFTs you will be eligible for the final NFT and a 20,000 $BNC tokens airdrop to share!

name: Stake DOT Earn Many
description:
From Oct 24 to Nov 07, take part in the most comprehensive staking campaign ever in the Polkadot ecosystem with Polkadot nomination pools, Acala, Bifrost, and Parallel liquid staking, and Interlay and Moonwell lending is happening at SubWallet Web Dashboard!

Users who have staked and earned a DOT Power Staker NFT are eligible to participate in this Airlyft campaign and share a reward pool of $1,000.

Note: 100 winners are selected based on a combination of points, content quality, and social media engagement. Each winner will receive 10 USDT on Polkadot Asset Hub.

Additional information: Users who stake with Acala, Bifrost, and Parallel from Oct 24 to Nov 07 have the chance to share exclusive reward pools, including 80K ACA, 5K BNC, and 1M PARA. More details are available in SubWallet Earning FAQs.

name: Zeitgeist x CoinDesk Indices
description: Zeitgeist is partnering with CoinDesk Indices to create a unique trading experience to give traders an edge in the broader market. By participating in Zeitgeist prediction markets surrounding specific CoinDesk Indices, traders are able to capitalize on their crypto knowledge, while other users can view the prediction market data and gain an informational edge on the direction of crypto prices in general!

name: Polkadot Unlock Harvest
description: The goal of the event is to pave the road for the DOT unlock event on October 24th. Introducing users to the dApp and familiarizing you with its mechanics and the assets within, you will be allowed to take advantage of the benefits of Bifrost Liquid Staking. The Moonbeam x Omni LS dApp Campaign is the first in a series of events that will also involve Polkadot ecosystem Wallets, as well as Polkadot itself.

name: Omni LS - Ecosystem Wallets campaign
description: One of three events leading up to the Unlock of +100 Million $DOT from the first parachain crowdloans, on Polkadot.
